post.author: Admin
post.title: Pre Game Gathering at the 3 Spot
post.description:
Hi Everyone!
Come join us tomorrow evening (Friday) before the game at The 3 Spot for our 1st preg
post.content:
Hi Everyone!

Come join us tomorrow evening (Friday) before the game at The 3 Spot for our 1st pregame gathering! This event will give you the opportunity to mingle with old friends, meet some new friends, win some money, order/pick-up buttons, buy your spirit wear, buy the winning ticket for the 50/50 drawing at the game (winner must be present at the football game), and become a member of the Band Booster organization! We will also sell one side board for more opportunities to win a little extra spending money! A limited menu will be offered to be sure we have time to eat before the game. Festivities begin at 4:30 but join us when you are able! We will start heading over to the game at approximately 6:15 and will find a spot in the bleachers that fits our spirited group! If you can't join us at the 3 Spot, please join us in the bleachers. Just look for the "Sea of Purple!"

Come dressed in your purple and gold! See you tomorrow evening!
